title: My Pbe Acc Has No RP - essence is that a bug?
body:
My nex Pbe acc has 0 RP and essence for more than 5 hours now the siystem said i will recieve the 3k rp and 5 essence in 1 hour 
my acc name "Tammyart"

replies.body: Hey there, per a recent [PBE post](https://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-pbe-feedback/T6INEVkN-store-back-online-within-1-hour-changes-to-rp-and-blue-essence), RP balance has changed a bit.  You should expect a stipend around noon pacific time, approximately.
